item.title: Lattice Diamond Tutorial: Project FrankANDstein
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: The goal of this mini-project is to create and simulate a full project for Lattice Diamond, from start to end. As a test subject, we will use the AND gate. We will create our own frankANDstein gate and give it liiiiiife. Installation /!\ I didn’t read the fine prints before installing, but short story, the simulator Active HDL is not included on the Linux version of Lattice Diamond. So find yourself a Windows box :(.
